data.title: Samsung SDS Chooses PRTM Management Consultants as Partner
data.meta_description: PRTM, a global operational strategy firm, has been chosen as apartner by Samsung SDS to leverage the management consultancy´sinnovation ...
data.text:
PRTM, a global operational strategy firm, has been chosen as a

partner by Samsung SDS to leverage the management consultancy´s

innovation expertise. Samsung SDS is a dedicated provider of IT and

consulting services to the Samsung companies and the top IT service

provider in the Asia-Pacific region. Samsung SDS evaluated the major

global management consulting firms and invited PRTM to become its

alliance partner based on PRTM´s reputation, intellectual property and

the firm´s ability to drive breakthrough results.

In Kim, President and CEO of Samsung SDS, and Michael Aghajanian,

PRTM´s Americas Managing Director and executive sponsor of the

partnership, recently announced the alliance at The Shilla hotel in

Seoul. PRTM and Samsung SDS will leverage the strengths each company

brings to the alliance to create a best-of-breed dedicated team to

drive innovation within the Samsung companies and across Asia. PRTM

will staff this dedicated team with veteran consultants, including a

lead director from PRTM´s Electronics and Computing Consulting

Practice.

"PRTM is thrilled to work with one of the leading companies in the

world as they enhance their reputation for innovation," said

Aghajanian. "As the innovation leader in management consulting, PRTM

is especially honored to help Samsung SDS and its clients achieve

breakthrough results, making them more competitive globally."

Kim agreed. "I am confident that the alliance with PRTM, the

top-tier operational strategy consulting firm, will further enhance

the global capabilities of Samsung SDS," he said.

PRTM also will deploy a PRTM Certification Program through Samsung

SDS´s learning institute, where qualified Samsung SDS consultants will

gain product lifecycle management (PLM)-related skills based on PRTM´s

Product And Cycle-time Excellence(R) (PACE(R)) framework. The two

companies plan to leverage those consultants certified by the program

in jointly staffed teams for PLM consulting projects in Korea and

Asia. This certification program will help build capacity for PLM in a

region where these solutions are in high demand.

About PRTM Management Consultants

Since 1976, PRTM has created a competitive advantage for its

clients by changing the way companies operate. PRTM management

consultants work with senior executives to develop and implement

innovative operational strategies that deliver breakthrough results.

The firm is a leader in operational strategy, supply chain, product

development, and customer value management. PRTM has 16 offices

worldwide and serves major industry and global public sectors. For

more information, visit www.prtm.com.
